    • 方法详细资料

      • connectTimeout

        public SocketOptions.Builder connectTimeout(Duration connectTimeout)
        Set connection timeout. Defaults to 10 SECONDS. See SocketOptions.DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT and SocketOptions.DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_UNIT.
        参数:
        connectTimeout - connection timeout, must be greater 0.
        返回:
        this
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0

      • connectTimeout

        @Deprecated
public SocketOptions.Builder connectTimeout(long connectTimeout,
                                                        TimeUnit connectTimeoutUnit)
        已过时。 since 5.0, use connectTimeout(Duration)
        Set connection timeout. Defaults to 10 SECONDS. See SocketOptions.DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT and SocketOptions.DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_UNIT.
        参数:
        connectTimeout - connection timeout, must be greater 0.
        connectTimeoutUnit - unit for connectTimeout, must not be null.
        返回:
        this

      • keepAlive

        public SocketOptions.Builder keepAlive(boolean keepAlive)
        Sets whether to enable TCP keepalive. Defaults to false. See SocketOptions.DEFAULT_SO_KEEPALIVE.
        参数:
        keepAlive - whether to enable or disable the TCP keepalive.
        返回:
        this
        另请参阅:
        SocketOptions.SO_KEEPALIVE

      • tcpNoDelay

        public SocketOptions.Builder tcpNoDelay(boolean tcpNoDelay)
        Sets whether to disable Nagle's algorithm. Defaults to false (Nagle enabled). See SocketOptions.DEFAULT_SO_NO_DELAY.
        参数:
        tcpNoDelay - true to disable Nagle's algorithm, false to enable Nagle's algorithm.
        返回:
        this
        另请参阅:
        SocketOptions.TCP_NODELAY

      • build

        public SocketOptions build()
        Create a new instance of SocketOptions
        返回:
        new instance of SocketOptions
